thread.title: BB Merah Putih officially announces the BlackBerry Aurora for the Indonesian market
thread.title_full: BB Merah Putih officially announces the BlackBerry Aurora for the Indonesian market

author: Bla1ze
title: BB Merah Putih officially announces the BlackBerry Aurora for the Indonesian market
text:
Through its strategic licensing partnership, BB Merah Putih launches its first BlackBerry-branded device in Indonesia, the BlackBerry Aurora.

As expected, based on earlier information , BB Merah Putih has now officially announced the BlackBerry Aurora for the Indonesian market, giving it the honor of being the first BlackBerry smartphone released by BB Merah Putih under its new brand licensing agreement signed with BlackBerry Limited in September 2016.
Read More Â»
